alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:10PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sac County in west central Iowa... Crawford County in west central Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 810 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Storm Lake to near Dunlap, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Denison, Sac City, Lake View, Odebolt, Black Hawk Lake, Schleswig, Wall Lake, Manilla, Schaller, Early, Dow City, Charter Oak, Vail, Westside, Kiron, Deloit, Arion, Nemaha, Buck Grove and Aspinwall. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Iowa.
